about_the_game:
Build towers anywhere in this tower defense game to damage and block incoming waves of evil enemies. Surprisingly, those enemies look like yourself.

Discover where they came from in an old-school setting with trippy music as you move from wave to wave unlike in any other tower defense game you have played.

You can delete, upgrade, and chose different types of towers to make the most optimal play. Most towers rely on the powers of the shaman who guides you through the game.

Story mode has 60 waves total with bosses at 10, 20, 30, 40, 50, and 60 waves. Each boss has a different power-up that you will need to combat. Make sure to rebuild your tower defenses to best fit the current wave.

Once you beat the final monster terrorizing the village, you will have a choice to make. Chose wisely, Defender!

Three modes are available:
- Easy: casually finish the game, and enjoy the story line.
- Medium: some challenge towards the end. Learn tips for extreme mode.
- Hard: learn the full power of mazes to beat the game. No mega attack required to finish it.

In Endless mode, you can play infinitely to try and test your mazing skills. Every 3 waves, you will choose a different power up. Each power up are associated with the types of towers you have in play. It's not a random selection of power ups!
